issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Update for IPC changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10095](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10095). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The IPC changes made to comply with MetadataVersion 4 broke the rust-parquet writer branch.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10095?focusedCommentId=17202259) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
